CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 3.0.0)
PROJECT(bindinglib)

ADD_COMPILE_OPTIONS(-std=c++11)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(include/gym)

FIND_PACKAGE(Curses REQUIRED)

FIND_PACKAGE(PkgConfig REQUIRED)
PKG_CHECK_MODULES(JSONCPP jsoncpp)

FIND_PACKAGE(CURL REQUIRED)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CURSES_INCLUDE_DIR})
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${JSONCPP_INCLUDE_DIR})
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CURL_INCLUDE_DIR})

SET(libreria_cpp
	./source/gym_binding.cpp
	./source/random_agent.cpp
)

ADD_LIBRARY(bindinglib STATIC ${libreria_cpp})

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(bindinglib ${CURSES_LIBRARIES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(bindinglib ${JSONCPP_LIBRARIES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(bindinglib ${CURL_LIBRARIES} -pthread)

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(bindinglib PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
